title: Immortals of Aveum Blends Call of Duty and Spellcasting
description:
Immortals of Aveum is an upcoming FPS title where magic is both your weapon and defense. You play as battlemage Jak as he joins other battlemages in an effort to save a planet. Jake Dekker had a chance to play, and these are his impressions.
#immortalsofaveum #immortalsofaveumgameplay #gamespot 

Immortals of Aveum is being developed by Ascendant Studios and published by EA. It's being handled by veteran Call of Duty and Dead Space developers, and is their first title. Immortals of Aveum is currently set to release to PS5, Xbox Series X/S, and PC on July 20, 2023.

title: Sonic Superstars Hands On Gameplay | Summer Game Fest 2023
description:
From the Sonic Team and developer Arzest comes a brand new 2D platforming Sonic game in Sonic Superstars.

Sonic Superstars brings Sonic back to his 2D roots with a 2.5D side scrolling platform game. The title lets players control one of four characters, Sonic the Hedgehog, Miles "Tails" Prower, Knuckles the Echidna, and Amy Rose. For Sonic Superstars, even sonic co-creator Naoto Ohshima has returned to design a brand new villain. Sonic Superstars releases to Nintendo Switch, PS4, PS5, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, and PC late 2023.

title: LORDS OF THE FALLEN - 'Dual Worlds' Official Gameplay Showcase
description:
Lords of the Fallen releases Friday 13th October.

A vast world awaits in all-new, dark fantasy action-RPG, Lords of the Fallen. As one of the fabled Dark Crusaders, embark on an epic quest to overthrow Adyr, the demon God.

#futuregameshow #gaming

title: Alan Wake 2 Gameplay Impressions | Summer Game Fest 2023
description:
Kurt Indovina had the chance to see Alan Wake II for a hands-off demo, and interview with director Kyle Rowley and Senior Narrative Designer, Molly Maloney. These are his impressions of Alan Wake II so far.
#gaming #AlanWake2 #gamespot 

2010's Alan Wake is finally seeing a true sequel in Alan Wake II. While 2019's Control was set in the same Remedy Connected Universe, fans of Alan Wake have been eagerly awaiting the game's return. Alan Wake II has a 3rd person perspective, ala Resident Evil 4 and Resident Evil 2 Remake, and will be a survival horror title. Alan Wake II is set to release to PS5, Xbox Series X/S, and PC on October 17, 2023.

title: Firearms Expert Reacts To System Shock (2023)’s Guns
description:
Jonathan Ferguson, a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries, breaks down the weaponry from System Shock, including the Phaser-like Sparqbeam, the Skorpion submachine gun, and the Mag-Pulse Rifle.

00:00 - Opening
00:30 - Mini Pistol
02:05 - TB-05 Sparqbeam
03:27 - Mark III Assault Rifle
06:46 - Ion Pulse
08:19 - JW-76 Mag-Pulse Rifle
10:30 - Magnum 2100
12:32 - Grenade Launcher
13:38 - Railgun
15:34 - KF-18 Skorpion
17:03 - Shotgun

In the latest video in the Firearm Expert Reacts series, Jonathan Ferguson--a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries--breaks down the guns of System Shock and compares them to their potential real-life counterparts.

Firearms Expert Reacts playlist - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y4T78VQoWUs&list=PLpg6WLs8kxGMgYb13XjPgOKbm5O-CDq7R

If you're interested in seeing more of Jonathan's work, you can check out more from the Royal Armouries right here. - https://www.youtube.com/user/RoyalArmouries

If you would like to support the Royal Armouries, you can make a charitable donation to the museum here. - https://royalarmouries.org/support-us/donations/

And if you would like to become a member of the Royal Armouries, you can get a membership here. - https://royalarmouries.org/support-us/membership/

You can either purchase Jonathan's book here. - https://www.headstamppublishing.com/bullpup-rifle-book

Or at the Royal Armouries shop here. - https://shop.royalarmouries.org/collections/thorneycroft-to-sa80-british-bullpup-firearms-1901-2020

You can subscribe to the Armax Journal that Jonathan Associate Edited here: https://www.armaxjournal.org/

title: Mortal Kombat 1 Character Changes And Story Explained By Ed Boon
description:
Ed Boon sat down with GameSpot to talk about the upcoming Mortal Kombat 1 and some of the games major changes.
#mortalkombat1 #mk1 #mortalkombat 

Ed Boon talked about the design of Sub-Zero, Liu Kang, Kenshi, and Kitana as well as their story. He also went into details both the "loose combat" design the team has employed this time around for Mortal Kombat, and the brand new kameo system, which sees characters like Sonya Blade, Kano, and Jax enter the fray as kameo fighters. Mortal Kombat 1 releases September 19, 2023 to PS5, Xbox Series X/S, Nintendo Switch, and Windows.
